creator: kadams@gfs.com
text:
When the FTP task currently creates a directory, if any of the parent
directories do not exist, the task fails.  I'd like to see the task
automatically create those parent directories as well, allowing the task to
finish successfully.

The updated patch (id=3180) stores the CWD initially and changes back to stored 
value after the directory tree is created.
creator: kadams@gfs.com

text:
Looks fine (after importing StringTokeinzer, that is ;-)

Thanks, should be in nightly build 2002-09-26.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
